title: Carbon Roller ANG-L
paragraphs: The Carbon Roller ANG-L is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Carbon Roller from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.
The Carbon Roller ANG-L makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 with identical stats to the Carbon Roller.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons

- Load videoLocal FileLocal File might collect personal data.ContinueDismisshttps://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:S3_Carbon_Roller_ANG-L_model_rotating.mp4


Promotional video (link to file)
The brand stylization suffix "ANG-L" is derived from anglerfish.
